nicher 1.0.0

get_ENM_par

Source: R/get_ENM_par.R
get_ENM_par.Rd

get ellipsoid parameters for a Ecollogical fundamental niche model.

Usage

get_ENM_par(
  occPts,
  env,
  M_shp = NULL,
  method = c("unbound", "bound", "mahalanobis"),
  fastmode = TRUE,
  itnmax = 100,
  return_best = TRUE
)

Arguments

occPts

A data frame with ocurrence points. Has species name, longitude and latitude

env

A raster stack

M_shp

A shape file as M hypothesis

method

Method selection. By default, optimization of the negloglike function with lower bound

fastmode

logical if is true the L-BFGS-B method is by default

itnmax

The maximum number of iterations.

return_best

logical. If true return the best optimization. If false return all the possible optimizations

Value

a list of parameters

Examples

M_path <- system.file("extdata", "Mshp_test.rds", package="nicher")
Mshp <- terra::unwrap(readr::read_rds(M_path))
stack_path <- system.file("extdata", "stack_1_12_crop.rds", package="nicher")
stack_1_12 <- terra::unwrap(readr::read_rds(stack_path))
get_ENM_par(rawSpOccPnts, stack_1_12, Mshp, method = "mahalanobis")
#> $mu
#>     bio1WH    bio12WH 
#>   21.41451 1882.60274 
#> 
#> $S
#>             bio1WH     bio12WH
#> bio1WH    8.073574    433.5456
#> bio12WH 433.545626 455709.4650
#>
